info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vernon Parish through 415 AM CDT... At 345 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Slagle, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leesville, Fort Polk, Slagle, Lacamp, Kurthwood, Hutton and Simpson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
